name: Chilliwack East Recreational Map
description: A waterproof, tearproof 1:40,000 scale map for the lakes and mountains around eastern Chilliwack, BC. It’s GPS-based with contour lines, roads, trails, forest service roads, campgrounds, and select mountaineering routes. Includes Chilliwack Lake, Chilliwack River, Bridal Falls, Cheam Lake, Skagit Range mountains, the Trans-Canada Trail, Cheam Range, Pierce Lake, Radium Lake, Mount Rexford, Slesse Mountain, Silverhope Creek, and has an inset of the Lindeman, Greendrop, and Flora Lakes trails.
